entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
